Question: INTERACT Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
INTERACT Co., Ltd.

Product Highlight: XR Education and Training Systems

- Utilizes XR technology for virtual education and training systems
- Offers NESTs and DAPREs Professional Training products
- Provides virtual education and training systems for various sectors including firefighting, military, and police
- Signed 2M USD contracts to supply Vietnam with XR education and training systems
- Won the Excellence Award at the KIC China Entrepreneurship Competition for its no-code production system
- Collaborates with universities for the development of virtual reality content
- Focuses on safety education and specialized training
- Participated in the CES 2024 exhibition to showcase cutting-edge XR firefighting and safety education training systems
